.. _singularity_sif_del:

singularity sif del
-------------------

Delete a specified object descriptor and data from SIF file

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Delete a specified object descriptor and data from SIF file

::

  singularity sif del <descriptorid> <containerfile> [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for del

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - siftool is a program for Singularity Image Format (SIF) file manipulation
